remarks: The ` QQHom ` homomorphism is a continuous function.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 9-Nov-2017.)
statement:
qqhcn.q $e |- Q = ( CCfld |`s QQ ) $.
qqhcn.j $e |- J = ( TopOpen ` Q ) $.
qqhcn.z $e |- Z = ( ZMod ` R ) $.
qqhcn.k $e |- K = ( TopOpen ` R ) $.
qqhcn $p |- ( ( R e. ( NrmRing i^i DivRing ) /\ Z e. NrmMod /\ ( chr ` R ) = 0 ) -> ( QQHom ` R ) e. ( J Cn K ) ) $.
